head.name: General keywords associated with the TAN collection for Evagrius of Pontus

inclusion.name: Persons and organizations mentioned in the project pertaining to the writings of Evagrius
Text bearing objects pertaining to the writings of Evagrius

head.change: Moved scripta to included vocabulary file; added new scripta vocabulary file as inclusion
Moved persons to separate TAN-voc file.

item.name: auxiliary
item.desc: A digital service or resource that provided an auxiliary role in making the source or data available.
